name: example-seed-beetle
title: Complex mitonuclear interactions and metabolic costs of mating in male seed beetles
description:
Data from the 2015 on metabolic rate, respiratory quotient, body
weight and ejaculate weight data from seed beetles with different
mitonuclear genotypes.

This repository shows how to use the Seedcase Sprout tools on a data set
of seed beetle data. The data is from a study by [Immonen et al.
(2015)](https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1111/jeb.12789) and is
available on [Zenodo](https://zenodo.org/records/4932381).

resources.name: seed-beetle-metabolic-rate
resources.title: Seed beetle metabolic rate
resources.description:
This dataset contains metabolic rate, respiratory quotient, body weight and
        ejaculate weight data from seed beetles with different mitonuclear genotypes.

fields.name: cycle
fields.title: Cycle
fields.description:
Focal cycle in the respirometry. Note that the number one here
                    corresponds to the real cycle number two, as the first one was
                    removed as a burn-in. Original field name: `CYCLE`.

fields.name: mating_treatment
fields.title: Mating treatment
fields.description: Mated or virgin. Original field name: `TREATMENT`.

fields.name: coadaptation
fields.title: Coadaptation
fields.description:
Coadaptation of the mitochondrial and nuclear lineage genomes.
                    Original field name: `COEVOL`.

fields.name: body_weight_after_mating
fields.title: Body weight after mating
fields.description:
Body weight after mating, prior to respirometry measurements.
                    Unit: g. Original field name: `W_M1`.

fields.name: mated_body_weight_after_respirometry
fields.title: Mated body weight after respirometry
fields.description:
Mated male body weight after the respirometry, prior to second
                    mating. Unit: g. Original field name: `W_M1R`.

fields.name: ejaculate_weight_first_mating
fields.title: Ejaculate weight in the first mating

fields.name: ejaculate_weight_second_mating
fields.title: Ejaculate weight in the second mating

fields.name: copulation_duration_first_mating
fields.title: Copulation duration of the first mating

fields.name: copulation_duration_second_mating
fields.title: Copulation duration of the second mating

fields.name: id
fields.title: ID
fields.description: Experimental subject identity. Original field name: `ID`.

sources.title: Complex mitonuclear interactions and metabolic costs of mating in male seed beetles
